---
title: "NYC Restaurant Inspections from 2017"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}

set.seed(88)

rest_inspection_data = rest_inspec %>%
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  separate(inspection_date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>%
  mutate(year = as.integer(year), month = as.integer(month), day = as.integer(day)) %>%
  filter(year == 2016) %>%
  sample_n(5000)

```


Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspection_data %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~day, y = ~score, color = ~day, type = "bar")
```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
rest_inspection_data %>% 
  count(score) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~score, y = ~n, color = ~score, type = "bar")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
rest_inspection_data %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~factor(month), type = "box", colors = "Set2")

```
